hero.subtitle_1: The ultimate field guide to Foundation: Galactic Frontier.
hero.subtitle_2: Strategies, tips, and data to conquer the galaxy.

tips.t1_content: Prioritize story missions early on. They unlock critical features like recruitment, ship modules, and new game modes essential for progression.
tips.t2_content: Claim your daily rewards every single day. Unclaimed resources are missed opportunities for growth that you effectively cannot recover.
tips.t3_content: Join an active guild as soon as possible. You gain access to shared resources, coordinated battles, and guild-exclusive events that boost your progress.
tips.t4_content: Master the three core styles: Beam beats Kinetic, Kinetic beats Ion, and Ion beats Beam. Mixing these effectively is key to winning battles.
tips.t5_content: Skills activate from left to right. Place your support or debuff champions in the first slots to maximize the damage of your attackers.
tips.t6_content: In combat, always pay attention to telegraphs. Avoid red attack zones to preserve your fleet's health.
tips.t7_content: Efficiently gather Ice Shards, Metal Shards, and Food. Upgrade your Mothership's Energy Core to boost generation rates.
tips.t8_content: Establish trade routes as soon as they are available. They provide a stable income of coins and materials passiveley.

hero_data.h1_notes: Essential for Ion rotations. Huge healing & team-wide INT buffs.
hero_data.h2_notes: Best Kinetic finisher. Deals massive burst damage (200% ATK).
hero_data.h3_notes: Core for Kinetic teams. Lowers enemy DEF by 20% to set up finishers.
hero_data.h4_notes: Beam powerhouse. Piercing damage that scales to 150% ATK.
hero_data.h5_notes: F2P friendly but S-Tier power. Great AOE and ability slowdowns.
hero_data.h6_notes: Beam Sync skill boosts ATK by 15%. Great opener for Beam teams.
hero_data.h7_notes: Ramps team damage by 10% per skill use. Strong anchor for long fights.
hero_data.h8_notes: Incredible shields (20% Max HP) and durability. Top tier tank.
hero_data.h9_notes: Consistent HOT (Heal Over Time) for Beam sustain.

ship_decks.kinetic_meta_desc: The ultimate physical damage setup. Relies on Eva debuffing enemies so Zora can one-shot them.
ship_decks.slot1_reason_kinetic: Lowers enemy DEF and buffs your team's damage BEFORE the big hits land.
ship_decks.slot2_reason_kinetic: High damage dealer. Benefits from Eva's debuffs to crush the enemy.
ship_decks.slot3_reason_kinetic: Provides healing or shields to keep the team alive.
ship_decks.beam_meta_desc: High precision and piercing damage. Melts through Kinetic shields.
ship_decks.slot1_reason_beam: Activates "Beam Sync" immediately, boosting all subsequent beam attacks.
ship_decks.slot2_reason_beam: Keeps the fragile Beam ships alive with heal-over-time.
ship_decks.slot3_reason_beam: Unleashes a massive piercing laser that benefits from Aliya's initial buff.
ship_decks.ion_meta_desc: Control and ability suppression. Excellent for PVP and Bosses.
ship_decks.slot1_reason_ion: Starts the "damage ramp" passive early in the chain.
ship_decks.slot2_reason_ion: Heals the team and provides INT buffs for the finisher.
ship_decks.slot3_reason_ion: Huge AOE explosion that slows enemy skills. Finishes the chain with crowd control.

ground_teams.early_game_desc: Accessible heroes that provide great value until you get Legendaries.
ground_teams.mid_game_desc: Solid team for progression before you unlock the full meta.
ground_teams.late_game_desc: The ultimate meta composition. High synergy and damage output.

events.kaboom_desc: Defeat waves of robot enemies. AOE damage is the key to success. Goal: 100 kills.
events.kaboom_essentials: In this event, Area of Effect (AOE) damage is the priority. It is the key to success.
events.kaboom_team1_note: Alternative: If you don't have Zora, replace her with Doug.
events.kaboom_protip1_content: They are formidable on the ground, even as basic units. Do not wait for them to be promoted to use them: upgrade their ground abilities now, they are well worth it.
events.calamity_desc: Wormholes appear in specific systems. Defeat Calamity ships for massive rewards. Event repeats every 3 hours for 72h.
events.calamity_essentials: Maximize DPS. Remove Healers. Speed is key.
events.calamity_protip1_content: Do in Group for daily 5 kills security. Do Solo for High Score records.
events.calamity_protip2_content: Go to an isolated border region to solo the event. You will save time on small targets without waiting for others.
events.calamity_protip3_content: Remove all healers. The enemies are weak but durable. Full DPS is required.
events.gvg_warning: ATTENTION: Leaving the guild during the event invalidates all your points.
events.gvg_golden_rule: Resources Management: If you see you cannot reach the next chest tier, STOP. Do not waste items unnecessarily.
events.gvg_desc: The ultimate battle for Star Ports and Territory. Requires high coordination and resource management.
events.gvg_tactic1_content: Go to "Battlefield Showdown" > "View" > "Teleport" to invade enemy territory.
events.gvg_tactic2_content: Use the "Home" button located just above the chat window.
events.gvg_tactic3_content: If enemies are hiding, get points via War Prisms, Port Garrisons, or intercepting Cargo Ships.
events.gvg_daily2_details: Commissions, Promotions, Legendary Skills, Guild Donations.
events.gvg_daily3_details: Research Speedups, Calc Modules, Beacons, Echoes.
events.gvg_daily5_details: Mix of all previous days. MOST RESOURCE HEAVY DAY.
events.gvg_daily6_details: Glory Points (PVP only), Destroy Fleets, Prism Damage/Last Hit.
events.gvg_protip1_content: You only have a 1-hour window. Do not trickle in. Regroup and hit with 7-8 Full Rallies simultaneousy.
events.gvg_protip2_content: Scout the enemy garrison. If they are heavy on Shields (Beam), swap to Kinetic ships.
events.top100_golden_rule: Resource Management: Do nothing without an event. Save for dedicated days.
events.top100_desc: 7-day event crucial for Gram Blueprints. Days 1-5: Development goals. Days 6-7: Galactic Showdown (PVP/Glory).
events.top100_day1_details:
The goal is to use speedups and buy packs. Using 1 minute of Building, Tech, or Shipbuilding speedups grants 16 points. Buying packs grants 4 points per Credit spent. 

*Strategic Tip:* For new servers, the focus is strictly restricted to Building, Research, and Shipbuilding speedups. Save your repair speedups for later.
events.top100_day2_details:
Earn points by obtaining and promoting champions. A Legendary champion is worth 2000 points, while an Epic is worth 100. Additionally, every 1 point of Power gained via leveling or promoting grants 1 point. 

*Strategic Tip:* On new servers, focus solely on unlocking, leveling up, and promoting champions to maximize your score.
events.top100_day3_details:
Points are awarded for PVE and Trading. Defeating Ascendancy Minions grants 1000-2000 points depending on level. Joining Tribute Vessel rallies grants 8000 points. Completing Trade Commissions awards 2800-4000 points based on rarity. 

*Strategic Tip:* Maximize your stamina usage on Minions and ensure you never miss a Tribute rally.
events.top100_day4_details:
Focus on upgrading your Flagship. Consuming Blueprints grants 2000 points per item. Increasing Flagship Power via upgrades or components grants 1 point per Power gained. 

*Strategic Tip:* This is the best day to use all the Blueprints you have been saving. On new servers, focus specifically on unlocking and promoting Flagship components.
events.top100_day5_details:
This is the "All-in" day. All methods from Days 1, 2, 3, and 4 are active and grant points. 

*Strategic Tip:* If you missed a specific day or have leftover resources, dump them all today to maximize your total rank before the PVP phase begins.
events.top100_day6_details:
The focus shifts entirely to Glory and PVP. 1 Battle Glory point equals 1 event point. 

*Strategic Tip:* You can earn Glory by fighting other players OR by collecting Orbs in the hunting zones (Kanvo, Kruger, Cerno, Sphinx). Fighting in high-level systems (Lvl 4+) grants 100% Glory, while lower systems reduce gains by 50%.
events.top100_tactic1_content: Collect orbs in hunting zones (Kanvo, Kruger, Cerno, Sphinx) or fight in PVP.
events.top100_tactic2_content: Fight in level 4+ systems (Warning: lvl 4-5 systems only give 50% glory).
events.top100_protip1_content: This event is crucial to obtain Gram Flagship Blueprints.
events.top100_protip2_content: Do nothing in-game without an event encouraging it. Save speedups for Day 1, Blueprints for Day 4.
events.top100_protip3_content: Save PVP for "Kill" events. Use Showdown to accumulate enough Glory to clear the shop every two weeks.
events.dominance_desc: Major event revolving around the conquest of the Stellar Fortress Xarnas (Level 9 System).
events.dominance_tactic1_content:
1. Combat: Attack or Defend the Fortress (Glory based).
2. Occupation: Hold the Fortress. Points depend on duration and fleet power (More Power = More Points).
3. Resilience: Points for Damage TAKEN in the Level 9 system.
events.dominance_tactic2_content:
The leader of the conquering guild becomes the Trader Prince. They have 24 hours to keep or transfer the title.
Responsibilities: Distribute Commendations (Gift Boxes), assign Server Titles, and activate Global Boosts.
events.dominance_title1_note: Permanent right hand of the Trader Prince.
events.dominance_protip1_content: You must hold the title AT THE START of the action to get the buff. If you start a construction with the title, the buff remains active even if you lose the title immediately after.
events.dominance_protip2_content: On healthy servers, titles are set to "Auto-accept". This creates a queue where each person has 5 minutes. Join the queue, wait for your turn, launch your upgrades, then let the next person in.
events.dominance_protip3_content:
Internal Affairs: Before new trade routes.
Military: Before ship production batches.
Construction/Research: MANDATORY before long-term upgrades.

champions.synergy_desc: It is <1>CRUCIAL</1> to match champions with the ship's Energy Type.
champions.golden_rule_desc: NEVER mix champion types. 3 Beams in a Beam ship is mandatory. A Kinetic champion in a Beam ship is useless.
champions.shard_management_desc: Save generic shards for <1>Lucius</1> or <1>Phade</1>. Absolutely avoid wasting them on Kama or Klara.
champions.update_note_desc: Damage is now more static and less reliant on RNG, but stat priorities remain the same.

desc.riian: Solid early game Kinetic attacker. Good single target damage.
desc.lani: Reliable Kinetic damage dealer. Easy to upgrade.
desc.cocoon: Incredible shields (20% Max HP) and durability. Top tier tank.
desc.eva: Core for Kinetic teams. Lowers enemy DEF by 20% to set up finishers.
desc.zora: Best Kinetic finisher. Deals massive burst damage (200% ATK).
desc.klara: Basic Beam healer. Good early sustain but falls off later.
desc.lucius: Strong Beam attacker. Prioritize if you lack Evan.
desc.doug: Consistent HOT (Heal Over Time) for Beam sustain.
desc.aliya: Beam Sync skill boosts ATK by 15%. Great opener for Beam teams.
desc.evan: Beam powerhouse. Piercing damage that scales to 150% ATK.
desc.kama: Decent Ion attacker can stun enemies.
desc.phade: Basic Ion healer. Useful for early Ion teams.
desc.jodi: Ramps team damage by 10% per skill use. Strong anchor for long fights.
desc.ajita: Essential for Ion rotations. Huge healing & team-wide INT buffs.
desc.lily: F2P friendly but S-Tier power. Great AOE and ability slowdowns.

flagships.title: Flagship Tactics
flagships.subtitle: Master your fleet with these advanced strategies.
flagships.vessels_vs_energy_desc: Do <1>not</1> confuse the 3 Flagship types with the 3 Damage types (Beam/Ion/Kinetic). Any Damage type can be assigned to any Ship via the <3>Core Component</3>.
flagships.starting_energy_desc: Energy gains from Promotion ranks 5 and 6 <1>stack</1>.
flagships.type_choice_desc: Although flexible, each ship ends up best complementing the default energy type of its Legendary champions in the late game.
flagships.acquisition_desc: Prioritize <1>Top 100</1> events for Gram Blueprints and <3>PVP/GvG</3> for Opportunity.

decks.title: Meta Ship Decks
decks.subtitle: Optimized fleet compositions for maximum efficiency.

gram.title: Gram
gram.subtitle: The Indestructible Fortress
gram.strategy_early: Use as a main tank to soak damage while your fleet scales.
gram.strategy_late: Transitions to a specialized buffer for Kinetic fleets.
gram.strategy_use: Best used with <0>Kinetic</0> fleets due to its synergy with physical damage reduction.
gram.ability1: <0>Titan Plating</0>: Reduces incoming damage by a flat amount + percentage.
gram.ability2: <0>Fleet Command</0>: Passively boosts the HP of all allied ships.

opportunity.title: Opportunity
opportunity.subtitle: The Tactical Assassin
opportunity.strategic_note: Its <0>Evasion</0> stat allows it to completely dodge attacks, making it deceptively tanky if built correctly.
opportunity.ability1_op: <0>Phantom Drive</0>: Increases evasion by 25% for short durations.
opportunity.ability2_op: <0>Precision Strike</0>: Guarantees a critical hit on the lowest HP enemy.

demerzal.title: Demerzal
demerzal.subtitle: The Ultimate Weapon
demerzal.strengths: Raw Firepower, Area of Effect, Shield Breaking
demerzal.strategy_synergy: Synergizes perfectly with <0>Beam</0> and <2>Ion</2> teams to strip shields or stun.
demerzal.ability1_dem: <0>Doomsday Laser</0>: Massive AOE damage that ignores 50% of shields.
demerzal.ability2_dem: <0>Energy Siphon</0>: Drains enemy energy to recharge its own main weapon.

ground_guide.title: Ground Teams
ground_guide.subtitle: Optimal team compositions for ground combat.

builder_ui.title: Construction Builder
builder_ui.how_it_works_desc:
The game calculates build times using this formula:
<1>(Base - Flat) / (1 + Bonus%)

Flat reductions (Crew Cabins) are applied <4>before percentage multipliers, making them extremely valuable for short builds but less impactful for week-long upgrades.
